attributes.action: Make parents more responsible for their child's actions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many children are getting away with commiting serious crimes. From verbal abuse in streets, threatening behaviour to muggings, and murder.   Children, as well as adults, need to be taught lessons. 
Often with every anti-social child you find an anti-social parent who is simple not providing the child with the displine they require to become a respectful member of society. 
I believe bad parents should be more accountable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
